author: felicity
msg: bug 3743: have the child reaper deal with multiple children if necessary, also have the restart handler wait for the specific pid to exit instead of any generic pid.

author: jm
msg: bug 3711: doco fix: correct the read_scoreonly_config() POD documentation to reflect that it no longer is just scores.

author: jm
msg: bug 3625: syslog-ng sometimes forks from inside syslog() when syslogd is restarted, causing a SIGCHLD, which calls syslog(), and therefore causes an infinite loop of respawning spamds.  work around this.
